Subjects: pageant verses; Henry VI, coronation; Henry V; Denis, saint; Virgin Mary, prayers to; chronicles, verse in
_description: Verse accompanying a soteltie at the coronation of Henry VI (1432), in Fabyan’s Chronicle; Part VII, Septima Pars, Henrici Sexti — two 8-line stanza

HarEng766.First Lines:
Agayn miscreauntes the Emperour SigismondeHath shewed his myght
                    which is Imperiall…
HarEng766.Last Lines:
…Born by discent and by title of RightIustly to Reigne In
                    Englond and in ffraunce
